      • evaluate

        protected int evaluate(Chromosome genotype,
           Activator activator,
           int threadIndex)
        Description copied from class: HyperNEATFitnessFunction
        Evaluate an individual genotype. This method is called from HyperNEATFitnessFunction.evaluate(List) , and must be overridden in order to evaluate the genotypes.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class HyperNEATFitnessFunction
        Parameters:
        genotype - the genotype being evaluated. This is not usually required but may be useful in some cases.
        activator - the phenotypic substrate of the genotype being evaluated.
        threadIndex - The index of the evaluator thread. This is not usually required but may be useful in some cases.

      • scale

        protected void scale(int scaleCount,
         int scaleFactor)
        Description copied from class: HyperNEATFitnessFunction
        Allow sub-class to make the necessary changes when a substrate scale occurs. If implemented, then at a minimum this method will usually need to set new values for the HyperNEATFitnessFunction.width and {#link height} array fields, and the HyperNEATFitnessFunction.connectionRange field if applicable.
        Overrides:
        scale in class HyperNEATFitnessFunction
        Parameters:
        scaleCount - A count of how many times a scale has previously occurred. In the first call this has value 0.
        scaleFactor - The amount the substrate is being scaled by.
